column5: I have a 2009 ford 150 xlt 4x4 Hooked up trailor and no lights on trailor Hooked to brother in laws triuck trailor lights worked Is there a fuse for trailor lights in truck Trailor lighs where factory installed Your help would be appreciated

There's a fuse box in the engine compartment, basically right above the rad and I think that's where you'll find the fuse for the trailer. If not, look in the panel down by where your passengers right foot would be.
And it will show it is. Blown

Do you have a 7 to 4 pin adapter? I found that my adapter can be installed upside down... but the trailer lights won't work. I thought my trailer lights weren't working; but I just had to rotate the adapter 180 degrees and the lights were fine.
